title: Revival God's Way
description: A clarion, no-compromise call to the principles of Biblical revival Revival God's Way Leonard Ravenhill writes, "After half a century of pleading, praying, preaching and writing about revival, we still have not experienced true revival. We live in a generation which has never known revival God's way - " The author's message is drastic, fearless and often radical. His goal for the church is nothing less than full restoration to the glory, power, holiness and dignity that Christ always intended for it. For all those Christians who yearn for Revival God's Way
author: Leonard Ravenhill
